languages.text: "Тогда можешь перевязать свои раны гордостью, а дырки в шкуре заткнуть честью".
"Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."
languages.original_text: "Тогда можешь перевязать свои раны гордостью, а дырки в шкуре заткнуть честью".

traits.locale_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “那你就用尊严来包扎伤口，用荣耀来堵住你身上的漏洞吧。”
languages.original_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."

traits.locale_text: “那你就用尊严来包扎伤口，用荣耀来堵住你身上的漏洞吧。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Entonces usa tu orgullo de venda y el honor para tapar tus heridas si quieres».
languages.original_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces usa tu orgullo de venda y el honor para tapar tus heridas si quieres».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「貴様のしょうもないプライドと誇りで傷を癒せるなら、そうするといい」
languages.original_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."

traits.locale_text: 「貴様のしょうもないプライドと誇りで傷を癒せるなら、そうするといい」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Dann könnt Ihr Euren Stolz nutzen, um Eure Wunden zu verbinden, und die Löcher in Eurer Haut mit Ehre stopfen."
languages.original_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."

traits.locale_text: "Dann könnt Ihr Euren Stolz nutzen, um Eure Wunden zu verbinden, und die Löcher in Eurer Haut mit Ehre stopfen."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Dans cas, pansez vos blessures avec votre fierté et rebouchez vos plaies avec votre honneur. »
languages.original_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."

traits.locale_text: « Dans cas, pansez vos blessures avec votre fierté et rebouchez vos plaies avec votre honneur. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "O vakit gururunla sararsın yaralarını. Derindeki delikleri de onurunla tıkarsın."
languages.original_text: "Then you can use your pride to bandage your wounds, and plug up the holes in your hide with honour."

traits.locale_text: "O vakit gururunla sararsın yaralarını. Derindeki delikleri de onurunla tıkarsın."
traits.speaker: Anger
